result.eng: She let out a loud scream of laughter.
result.ga: Lig sí liú ard gáire aisti
result.orig: Lig sí liú ard gáire aisti
result.html: Lig sí liú ard gáire aistiShe let out a loud scream of laughter.
result.ponchtml: Lig sí liú ard gáire aistiShe let out a loud scream of laughter.

result.eng: Osama Bin Laden would certainly be laughing.
result.ga: Go cinnte bheadh Osama Bin Laden ag gáirí
result.orig: Go cinnte bheadh Osama Bin Laden ag gáirí
result.html: Go cinnte bheadh Osama Bin Laden ag gáiríOsama Bin Laden would certainly be laughing.
result.ponchtml: Go cinnte ḃeaḋ Osama Bin Laden ag gáiríOsama Bin Laden would certainly be laughing.

result.eng: A smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ga: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.orig: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.html: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ponchtml: Ḃris meangaḋ gáire amaċ ar aġaiḋ an ḟáilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.

result.eng: All the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ga: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.orig: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.html: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ iomlán na bpáistí siocṫa leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.

result.eng: Laughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ga: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.orig: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.html: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthiLaughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ponchtml: Ag déanaṁ gáire naċ raiḃ a ḟonn uirṫiLaughing even though she didn't want to.

result.eng: She could have laughed and that would be it.
result.ga: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh de
result.orig: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh de
result.html: Thiocfadh léi gáire a dhéanamh agus sin a mbeadh deShe could have laughed and that would be it.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ léi gáire a ḋéanaṁ agus sin a mbeaḋ deShe could have laughed and that would be it.
